G9_chart_renders_data.notes: StrategyMatrixChart.tsx renders a Scatter chart with mapped project data.

G10_tooltips_implemented.notes: Custom Tooltip component found in StrategyMatrixChart.tsx.

A2_score_normalization.notes: Mathematically correct and part of a robust build pipeline.

A3_quadrant_assignment.notes: Well-structured, separated from UI, and handles boundaries correctly.

A4_scatter_plot_rendering.notes: Correct axes and domain. Quadrants are indicated with dashed lines, though not explicitly labeled in the chart background (labeled in legend/tooltip).

A5_tooltip_implementation.notes: Rich information including Title, Quadrant, ROI, and a direct link to the project.

A6_logic_ui_separation.evidence: Logic in scripts/governance/ vs UI in src/components/StrategyMatrixChart.tsx
A6_logic_ui_separation.notes: Excellent separation using a build-time data generation strategy.

A_strategy_matrix.category_commentary: The Strategy Matrix implementation is near perfect. The candidate chose to build a dedicated 'Governance Engine' script that pre-processes the data, which is a highly scalable and professional approach.

B1_project_setup.notes: Professional Next.js setup with linting and clear scripts.

B2_routing_navigation.notes: Complete route structure matching PRD with consistent navigation.

B3_type_safety.notes: Strong typing with Zod schemas for runtime validation.

B4_data_layer.notes: Production-quality data layer using a master_data.json artifact.

B_technical_foundation.category_commentary: Solid technical choices. Using Zod for build-time validation of content files demonstrates deep understanding of robust software engineering.

C1_visual_design.notes: Polished, cohesive design with great attention to spacing and hierarchy.

C2_responsive_design.notes: Functional responsiveness throughout. Charts reflow well.

C3_interactivity.notes: High interactivity with keyboard shortcuts and smooth transitions.

C4_empty_error_loading_states.notes: Skeleton loaders for dashboard widgets and matrix chart are excellently implemented.

C5_design_token_usage.notes: Branding from config.json is integrated, though some colors are still hardcoded in components.

C_ui_ux_quality.category_commentary: The UI feels like a real product. Inclusion of Cmd+K search and skeleton loaders significantly elevates the UX.

D2_quadrant_logic_accuracy.notes: Correct labels and boundaries. Lacks background labels on the chart itself (score 4 requirement).

D3_route_structure.notes: All PRD-specified routes are implemented and functional.

D4_specification_details.notes: X-Axis is Effort, Y-Axis is Impact as specified.

D_prd_compliance.category_commentary: Excellent adherence to the product requirements. The candidate clearly spent time reading and understanding the PRD.

E1_separation_of_concerns.evidence: Distinct scripts/, context/, lib/, components/ and app/ directories.
E1_separation_of_concerns.notes: Very clean architecture. Components are purely presentational.

E2_readability_naming.notes: Clean, self-documenting code with precise naming.

E3_error_handling.notes: Strong validation with meaningful error messages during build.

E_code_quality.category_commentary: Production-grade code. The separation of the 'Governance Engine' from the frontend is a standout architectural decision.

F1_dashboard.notes: Comprehensive dashboard with multiple calculated widgets (metrics, velocity, activity).

F2_additional_pages.evidence: Roadmap, Updates, and Project Library pages implemented.

F3_search_filtering.notes: Full search experience with Cmd+K and Fuse.js weighting.

F4_creative_additions.evidence: scripts/ingestion/ (AI pipeline) and scripts/governance/ temporal logic
F4_creative_additions.notes: The inclusion of a complete AI-driven ingestion pipeline (normalization -> LLM extraction -> staging -> promotion) is exceptional and exceeds all expectations.

F_bonus_features.category_commentary: The candidate went far beyond the requirements, building a production-ready AI pipeline for project ingestion and sophisticated temporal governance logic.

G1_prioritization.evidence: Full implementation of all core and most bonus requirements.
G1_prioritization.notes: Strategically spent time on high-impact items like the data pipeline and search.

G2_pr_description.evidence: Candidate provided custom run instructions and ingestion workflow commands in their submission message.
G2_pr_description.notes: While the README is largely boilerplate, the candidate provided clear, specific instructions on how to run and test the advanced ingestion pipeline, satisfying the 'submission summary' requirement.

G_decision_making.category_commentary: Excellent prioritization. They built a cohesive product rather than isolated features. Adjusted PR description score to 2 to reflect that instructions were provided outside of the README/PR.

H2_message_quality.notes: Descriptive but could be more precise.

H3_logical_progression.evidence: Git log shows foundation -> feature -> polish

top_strengths: Robust data pipeline (Governance Engine) and a sophisticated AI Ingestion Pipeline (scripts/ingestion).
Excellent use of Zod for content validation and runtime safety.
Highly polished UI/UX with professional touches like Cmd+K search and skeleton loaders.
Inclusion of temporal logic that automatically updates project status based on dates.
top_weaknesses: Minor omission: Quadrant background labels not directly rendered on the scatter plot.
Git commit messages could be more formal (e.g., conventional commits).
standout_moments: The AI Ingestion Engine is a complete, well-reasoned feature that demonstrates advanced technical skill.
The use of a master_data.json build artifact is a very scalable architectural pattern.
qualitative_summary.hiring_signal: This is a top-tier candidate with strong architectural thinking and a high degree of product awareness. They demonstrate mastery of the React/Next.js stack and a commitment to code quality and robust data handling.
